comments.body: If the goal is a direct link to #ansible, then again a link to https://matrix.to/#/#users:ansible.im (#ansible) or https://matrix.to/#/#devel:ansible.im (#ansible-devel) could work? I'm on the fence, a link to the full list of channels isn't wrong either ....

That said, the more we link to the one :ref: for everything, the more I'm convinced we need a huge "join *this* room if you're even 1% unsure" section, because that page is large and has many options ...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +45,49 @@       Mailing list for development topics
   :ref:`communication_irc`
       How to join Ansible chat channels
